noun.description: More fully "oil-nut tree". Any of various trees or shrubs that produce oil-rich nuts or large seeds; specifically (a) the castor oil plant, Ricinus communis; (b) the butternut, Juglans cinerea; (c) the buffalo-nut, Pyrularia pubera; (d) the oil palm, Elaeis guineensis.
The nut or large seed of such a plant.
